attributes.action: Guaranteeing BNO Visa official immigrants to have better employment please
attributes.additional_details: It is hoped that the government will provide more employment and life support to help Hong Kong people and some rare Hong Kong people area let them avoid the hardships of life.
attributes.background: I hope the government will provide more employment and living security. So far, peoples of BNO Visa has not been able to get living and employment support.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 
 
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
